input.sentences: it was finally time for the fireworks display to begin .
there were large red fireworks in the sky .
then there were blue ones that went up .
after that | they had blue and white fireworks in the sky .
at the end | they had fireworks of many different colors in the sky .
output.sentences: First red fireworks lit up the sky.
Then white explosions joined the party.
Then there were blue cascades of spark.
The show ended in a grand finale.
